title: Unique Periodic Black Screen Issue
body:
So my issue is that every game that I am in, I get random periodic black screens every couple of minutes lasting usually less than one second almost as if the game wants to minimize or something along those lines. This issue is unique to league of legends only and I have attempted to reinstall, repair, clean reinstall graphics drivers, tried playing in windowed, fullscreen, and borderless. All still while having the same issue. I've noticed it a few times happening after i was ignited or I just died. I have stress tested my computer in 3DMark with zero black screen issues. I believe this must be a software issue or a league specific issue between my computer and the client. I played Osiris: New Dawn for over an hour last night with zero issues. Help please!

replies.body:
Thanks a ton for going to great lengths to provide me with as much information as possible! ^.^

I spoke to our tech dudes and it seems there are two potential things causing issues here. The first is the Windows 10 Game Bar, which recently was updated to perform in-game DVR. This feature has been pretty problematic over the last month, so I recommend [disabling it](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this.

If that doesn't resolve the issue, then I'd disable Nvidia Shadowplay, since it's been causing these types of issues as well. If you can't find a setting to disable Shadowplay, I recommend closing out or uninstalling GeForce Experience entirely to see if it fixes this.

Let me know if either of those worked for you.

So i did both of these and the issue still appears to be happening. The screen seems to fracture slightly and it happens a lot when i'm clicking in the shop. I would assume a graphics issue but i have no problems in anything else.

Darn, I was hopeful one of those would be the solution!

I think at this point this is a complex problem that one of our tech team members will want to dive into with you. I recommend running a set of system logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
I'll definitely try both of those! Thanks for the quick response.
